props.ritualRulestext:
Travel Over Distance

This violent ritual rips apart time and space, removing you from one location and depositing you in another. It takes one hour to perform. On a result of no successes, you will reappear... elsewhere, lucky if not stuck inside another object. The drain affects everyone who is using the spell to travel. You can only travel to a place you know well and have specifically enchanted and prepared with ten manastelliate.
